body_html:
Hi AlexisTm.
I had some side issues with other things not working the way I would like and wanted to share with you what I did.
I downloaded the anaconda python 3.5 from here:
https://repo.continuum.io/archive/index.html
for my install I used:
Anaconda3-4.2.0-Windows-x86_64
I then did a Pip upgrade from the cmd window:
pip - m pip install --upgrade pip
I was then able to run the command but added to the end of the string "--ignore-installed"
pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/windows/gpu/tensorflow_gpu-0.12.1-cp35-cp35m-win_amd64.whl --ignore-installed
This worked perfectly (so far).

body:
Hi AlexisTm.
I had some side issues with other things not working the way I would like and wanted to share with you what I did.
I downloaded the anaconda python 3.5 from here:
https://repo.continuum.io/archive/index.html
for my install I used:
Anaconda3-4.2.0-Windows-x86_64
I then did a Pip upgrade from the cmd window:
pip - m pip install --upgrade pip
I was then able to run the command but added to the end of the string "--ignore-installed"
pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/windows/gpu/tensorflow_gpu-0.12.1-cp35-cp35m-win_amd64.whl --ignore-installed
This worked perfectly (so far).
